places_to_visit.name: Schönbrunn Palace
places_to_visit.description: Schönbrunn Palace is a magnificent Baroque palace with stunning gardens. It was the summer residence of the Habsburgs and features opulent rooms, extensive grounds, and the world's oldest zoo.

places_to_visit.name: St. Stephen's Cathedral
places_to_visit.description: St. Stephen's Cathedral is a Gothic cathedral located in the heart of Vienna. It’s known for its impressive architecture, colorful roof tiles, and panoramic views from its south tower.

places_to_visit.name: Belvedere Palace
places_to_visit.description: Belvedere Palace is a historic complex that includes the Upper and Lower Belvedere. It houses an extensive collection of Austrian art, including works by Gustav Klimt, and offers beautiful gardens and architecture.

places_to_visit.name: Vienna State Opera
places_to_visit.description: The Vienna State Opera is one of the most prestigious opera houses in the world. It hosts a wide range of performances and features stunning architecture and an opulent interior.

places_to_visit.name: MuseumsQuartier
places_to_visit.description: MuseumsQuartier is a cultural complex featuring several museums and art spaces, including the Leopold Museum and the Museum of Modern Art. It’s a hub for contemporary art and culture.

activities: Tour Schönbrunn Palace and explore its gardens
Visit St. Stephen's Cathedral and climb the tower
Explore the art collection at Belvedere Palace
Attend a performance at the Vienna State Opera
Stroll through MuseumsQuartier and visit its museums
tips_and_tricks: Book tickets for the Vienna State Opera in advance.
Wear comfortable walking shoes for exploring the city's many attractions.
Try traditional Viennese dishes like schnitzel at local restaurants.
